sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' function UseStateHook() { const [name,setName]=useState('') const [userInp,setUserInp]=useState({name:'',regdNo:''}) return (
UseStateHook {name}
setUserInp({...userInp,name:userInp.name})} placeholder='' />
setUserInp({...userInp,regdNo:userInp.regdNo})} placeholder='' />
) } export default UseStateHook
